mapper.insert: insert into bd_chosen_cases (ccid, chosenid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpxdf, dpr, dpsj, tjly, tbrq, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chosenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzpxdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tjly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_chosen_cases set chosenid = #{chosenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psgroupid = #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jydp = #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzpxdf = #{zzpxdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpr = #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpsj = #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tjly = #{tjly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tbrq = #{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ccid, chosenid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpxdf, dpr,date_format(dpsj, '%Y/%m/%d') dpsj, tjly, date_format(tbrq, '%Y/%m/%d') tbrq, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by,date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_chosen_cases where ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ccid, chosenid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpxdf, dpr,date_format(dpsj, '%Y/%m/%d') dpsj, tjly, date_format(tbrq, '%Y/%m/%d') tbrq, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by,date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_chosen_cases
